Notes.Text:
This update fixes the following issues:
  
  -  CVE-2017-12613: DoS or information disclosure in pr_exp_time*() or apr_os_exp_time*() functions (bsc#1064982).
Notes.Title: Details

Notes.Text: The CVRF data is provided by SUSE under the Creative Commons License 4.0 with Attribution (CC-BY-4.0).
Notes.Title: Terms of Use

Relationships.RelatesToProductReference: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12 SP3
SUSE Linux Enterprise Software Development Kit 12 SP3
SUSE Linux Enterprise Software Development Kit 12 SP3

Vulnerabilities.Description: When apr_time_exp*() or apr_os_exp_time*() functions are invoked with an invalid month field value in Apache Portable Runtime APR 1.6.2 and prior, out of bounds memory may be accessed in converting this value to an apr_time_exp_t value, potentially revealing the contents of a different static heap value or resulting in program termination, and may represent an information disclosure or denial of service vulnerability to applications which call these APR functions with unvalidated external input.

ProductID: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12 SP3:libapr1-1.5.1-4.3.1
SUSE Linux Enterprise Software Development Kit 12 SP3:libapr1-1.5.1-4.3.1
